column1: albin joseph blazucki| albin joseph blazucki. born: march 15
column7: beloved husband of dr. joan blazucki for 47 years; devoted father of laura saoud and her husband abdallah
column9: and marya de. luna; dear brother of catherine ploch
column12: and the late mary joan brown; loving grandfather of marissa kelsh
column14: and felix blazucki. also survived by many nieces
column17: and friends. family and friends will honor als life at the family owned evans funeral chapel and cremation services parkville
column18: 8800 harford rd. on tuesday from 2-4 & 6-8 pm. a funeral liturgy will be held 10 am wednesday at holy rosary catholic church. interment holy rosary cemetery. send sympathy card print name location email personal message hide emailenter personal message here too difficult to read? reload. type the text in order submit guest book entry .
